text: ' Game of Thrones'Co - Stars Kit Harington and Rose Leslie Are Engaged Wedding bells are coming. Looks like Ygritte and Jon Snow were meant to be, after all. Game of Thrones co - stars Rose Leslie and Kit Harington are engaged. The news was confirmed with an engagement announcement placed in The Times of London on Wednesday. The announcement reads : ` ` The engagement is announced between Kit, younger son of David and Deborah Harington of Worcestershire, and Rose, middle daughter of Sebastian and Candy Leslie of Aberdeenshire.'' There ’ s going to be a Game of Thrones wedding pic. twitter. com / 8UGGMCh9GH — Elliot Wagland ( @ elliotwagland ) September 27, 2017
